lyrics:
12 contributorsfast forward to 2012 lyricsintro
we welcome you to the second chapter
thanks for turning the other page
we acknowledge you as the only reason
for the progress that weve made
youre a constant reminder
we came we saw we conquered
everything has come so far from where we were before

prechorus
well keep this short and sweet so ill
get to the point

chorus
my friends come first thats the bottom line
my friends come first thats the bottom line
my friends come first thats the bottom line
my friends come first thats the bottom line

postchorus
thats the bottom line

bridge
heres to the future never getting older
when the tables do turn where will you be
see a day to remember liveget tickets as low as 108you might also likebreakdown
pick up your feet
pick it up5embed
